column5: Hi All,Looking for a bait casting rod that can throw a #8 or 9 shad rap. I like stiff rods with fast tips, but rods with these characteristics usually won't throw a light crank bait well. My reels are small bait casting Shimanos. Can't remember their names, but got them about 10 years ago and they are still as smooth as they were out of the box.Thanks,Steve
